mapper.select: SELECT p.id,p.name,p.subTitle,p.orignalPrice,p.promotePrice,p.stock,p.createDate, SUM(oi.number) saleCount,MIN(img.id) fpi,COUNT(r.createDate) reviewCount, c.id cid,c.name cName, img.id imgId,img.pid,img.type FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.cid=c.id LEFT JOIN productimage img ON p.id=img.pid LEFT JOIN review r ON p.id=r.pid LEFT JOIN orderitem oi ON p.id=oi.pid WHERE p.id=#{id}

SELECT p.id,p.name,p.subTitle,p.orignalPrice,p.promotePrice,p.stock,p.createDate, SUM(oi.number) saleCount,MIN(img.id) fpi,COUNT(r.createDate) reviewCount, c.id cid,c.name cName, img.id imgId,img.pid,img.type FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.cid=c.id LEFT JOIN productimage img ON p.id=img.pid LEFT JOIN review r ON p.id=r.pid LEFT JOIN orderitem oi ON p.id=oi.pid WHERE CONCAT(p.name,p.subTitle) LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" GROUP BY p.id

SELECT p.id,p.name,p.subTitle,p.orignalPrice,p.promotePrice,p.stock,p.createDate, SUM(oi.number) saleCount,MIN(img.id) fpi,COUNT(r.createDate) reviewCount, c.id cid,c.name cName, img.id imgId,img.pid,img.type FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.cid=c.id LEFT JOIN productimage img ON p.id=img.pid LEFT JOIN review r ON p.id=r.pid LEFT JOIN orderitem oi ON p.id=oi.pid WHERE c.id=#{cid} GROUP BY p.id
